recruitedWant.dismiss: You can go now. Thank you for the support! Bye!
spouseBuffDescription: Adventure with your {0} is very magnetising!#You got +1 extra luck, +1 extra magnetic radius and a lovely glow.
bagItemsSentLetter: Hi {0},^^You forgot some items in my bag. I've sent them back to you.^Yesterday's adventure was fun and I look forward to the next.^^    - {1}
lifeSaved: {0} saved your life... this time! Be patient.
skillDescription.warrior: Can fight with a sword and use critical defense in danger.
skillDescription.doctor: Can heal you when your health is under 30%.#Just talk with your companion if you are injured.
